author: jukka
msg: No need to double-check custom configurations from 1.4.

author: ate
msg: - Adding the organization definition again as proposed by David Jencks
- Restoring the initial assembly-plugin configuration as provided by David Jencks using the redefined assembly project descriptor again.
Note: I'm not sure yet this works as intended, I'll actually have to make a release on portlet-api_2.0_spec first to see if it won't also include the temporary velocity.log file.
If it does include velocity.log however, I currently inclined to simply ignore that for now, no harm done by having that in the -project distro really, even if its a temporary build artifact

author: tvolkert
msg: Restructured tutorials demo to use named inner classes as opposed to anonymous inner classes

author: jbohn
msg: there is a new openejb-api jar dependency that we need to build the client and openejb plugins.  That additional jar is really the only change but the order of all the other dependencies also changed in the generated file results in what you see being checked in here.
